T02D2209:180b-1: sa ma y'a lam k'a ra /
T02D2209:180b-4: phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D2209:180b-5: / dam tshig med dang 'chal par gtong //
T02D2209:180b-6: so ma nyi la sogs bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2209:180b-7: dam chig rnams ni mdor bsdus nas //
T02D2209:180b-8: gsang ba'i bdag la 'dud de bshad //
T02D2209:180b-9: sngags pas srung ba'i dam tshig ni //
T02D2209:180b-10: dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas //
T02D2209:180b-11: nya'am stong gi dus dag tu ;
T02D2209:180b-12: / yan lag brgyad pa nyer gnas te //
T02D2209:180b-13: lo gcig pa'am zla gcig bya //
T02D2209:180b-14: de nas ji srid sems bskyed de //
T02D2209:180b-15: bslab pa lnga po legs bzung nas //
T02D2209:180b-16: lo gcig zla gcig bar dag tu //
T02D2209:180b-17: sngom pa brtan por gzung bar bya //
T02D2209:180b-18: de nas dge tshul dge slong gi / bslab pa la ni legs gnas te //
T02D2209:180b-20: sngom pa nyams pa blang bar bya //
T02D2209:180b-21: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa //
T02D2209:180b-22: gang zhig gis ni legs gnas na //
T02D2209:180b-23: mkhas pa rnams kyis dus kun du //
T02D2209:180b-24: srog gi phyir yad mi gtong ngo //
T02D2209:180b-25: gang zhig gis ni de goms 'gyur //
T02D2209:180b-26: gang tshe gong ma'i bslab gnas pas //
T02D2209:180b-27: de tshe 'og ma'i ming dang bral //
T02D2209:180b-28: dang po sbyin pas bslab bya ste //
T02D2209:180b-29: dngos po bcu gnyis yang dag ldan //
T02D2209:180b-30: bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang //
T02D2209:180b-31: shes rab gsum ste gsum du bstan //
T02D2209:180b-32: gzhan gyi mya ngan sangs la sogs //
T02D2209:180b-33: sems can don 'gyur thams cad kun //
T02D2209:180b-34: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo //
T02D2209:180b-35: sdom pa lo'am zla ba ru //
T02D2209:180b-36: brtan nas sngags kyi dam tshig blang //
T02D2209:180b-37: spyi dang khyad par gnyis su shes //
T02D2209:180b-38: dang po dag ni bshad bya ste //
T02D2209:180b-39: dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya //
T02D2209:180b-40: yi dam spong len mi bya ste //
T02D2209:180b-41: lus dang ngag yid sku gsung thugs ;
T02D2209:180b-42: / phyag rgya che la rab tu gnas //
T02D2209:180b-43: dam pa rnams ni smad mi bya //
T02D2209:180b-44: gsang ba'i don yang bstan mi bya //
T02D2209:180b-45: rtags chen sku yang mi bstan te //
T02D2209:180b-46: bzlas dang sems nyams bstan mi bya //
T02D2209:180b-47: rdo rje dril bu phreng ba dang /
T02D2209:180b-48: skad cig tsam yang spang mi bya //
T02D2209:181a-2: / khyad par grogs la smos ci dgos //
T02D2209:181a-3: tshogs dang gtor ma sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2209:181a-4: mandala cha cha la sogs pa //
T02D2209:181a-5: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo //
T02D2209:181a-6: chos kyi spyod pa gzhan rnams kyang //
T02D2209:181a-7: spang bar 'gyur ba smos ci dgos //
T02D2209:181a-8: sha chen khrag dang khu ba dang //
T02D2209:181a-9: dri chen dang ni dri chu dang //
T02D2209:181a-10: blang dang spang bar bya ba min //
T02D2209:181a-11: rtsa ba byang chub sems mi btang //
T02D2209:181a-12: chos la smod pa spang bar bya //
T02D2209:181a-13: dad ldan bsam pa sum med byung //
T02D2209:181a-14: bud med rnams ni smad mi bya //
T02D2209:181a-15: spang dang blang bar bya ba min //
T02D2209:181a-16: bgrod min la ni bgrod pa min //
T02D2209:181a-17: sbong ba mi sbong gyur pa dang //
T02D2209:181a-18: blang bya mi lan spang bar bya //
T02D2209:181a-19: dug lnga spong ba spang bar bya //
T02D2209:181a-20: blang ba yang ni spang ba min //
T02D2209:181a-21: dug lnga ma spangs par spyad bya //
T02D2209:181a-22: dam pa ma yin bsten mi bya //
T02D2209:181a-24: dgongs pa can gyi gzhi rnams kun //
T02D2209:181a-25: bla ma med par bsten mi bya //
T02D2209:181a-26: dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02D2209:181a-27: gzhan la phan 'dogs byed pa rnams //
T02D2209:181a-28: cho ga rdzogs par bya bar bya //
T02D2209:181a-30: dus ma yin pa'i spyod pa spang //
T02D2209:181a-31: dus kyang gzhan dang mi mthun spang //
T02D2209:181a-32: grogs su 'gyur na smod ba spang //
T02D2209:181a-33: rtag tu mi dang spyod pa bstun //
T02D2209:181a-34: dang po dka' thub bsten pa ste //
T02D2209:181a-35: tha ma'i dus su spang bar bya //
T02D2209:181a-36: chang sogs nyes par gyur pa spang //
T02D2209:181a-37: thabs ldan dngos grub sbyor bar 'gyur //
T02D2209:181a-38: gang tshe bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2209:181a-39: de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kun /
T02D2209:181a-41: bslab pa dag la mi gnas par //
T02D2209:181a-42: rtag tu bya ba rnams la 'jug / skyes bu de ni bdud kyis bslus //
T02D2209:181a-43: gang zhig bzod pa mi bsten pa'i //
T02D2209:181a-45: dgra sogs nyes pa ci byas pa //
T02D2209:181a-46: rang gi zhe sdang khros rbad pas //
T02D2209:181a-47: nyes na zhe sdang khro bar rigs //
T02D2209:181a-48: dgra rnams gzhan du bros phyir min //
T02D2209:181a-49: de phyir de la nyes pa mad //
T02D2209:181a-50: bzod na dge rtsa kun gyi mchog / da rgyal la sogs nyon mongs kun //
T02D2209:181a-51: bskyed pa don med spang don can //
T02D2209:181b-0: de phyir nyon mongs @181b spang bar bya //
T02D2209:181b-1: khyad par thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D2209:181b-2: gos sngon po dang raksha dang //
T02D2209:181b-3: rus pa'i phreng ba blang bar bya //
T02D2209:181b-4: dus kun du ni rang lha mchod //
T02D2209:181b-5: rtag tu bla ma mnyes pa bya //
T02D2209:181b-6: rtag tu rang lha'i bsnyen par bya //
T02D2209:181b-7: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
T02D2209:181b-8: rtag tu sngags kyi spyod pa bsten //
T02D2209:181b-9: rtag tu chos kyi dam pa blang //
T02D2209:181b-10: rtag tu khrus kyi cho ga bya //
T02D2209:181b-11: srog gcod pa yi sems can pas //
T02D2209:181b-12: kun du rgyug par byed pa bla //
T02D2209:181b-13: de bas mkhas pas dus kun du //
T02D2209:181b-14: srog gcod pa ni spang bar bya //
T02D2209:181b-15: grong khyer 'jug dang gtor ma gtang //
T02D2209:181b-16: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo //
T02D2209:181b-17: dam tshig rtag tu srung byed pa'i //
T02D2209:181b-19: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che //
T02D2209:181b-20: dam tshig gdug pa zil gyis non //
T02D2209:181b-21: dam tshig thub dka' gdug pa 'joms //
T02D2209:181b-22: de bas mkhas bas dus kun du //
T02D2209:181b-24: gang dag dam tshig med cing sbyor ba kun spang ba //
T02D2209:181b-25: rtag tu dngos grub sbyor spangs sdug bsngal thams cad bskyed //
T02D2209:181b-26: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel mdzad sangs rgyas rdo rje can //
T02D2209:181b-27: rtag tu thub byed sdom gnas rtag tu bde ba'i mchog //
T02D2209:181b-28: bla med lam mchog gsang chen de nyid spang //
T02D2209:181b-29: mi gnas dngos grub med cing tsha grang sdug bsngal myong //
T02D2209:181b-30: don nor smra ba nyams shing slob dpon bka' sogs
T02D2209:181b-31: bcag / spyi nas bla med blang zhing mkha' 'gros
T02D2209:181b-32: snying 'dren na // gnod byed me dbal rtag tu da gra bzhin spang //
T02D2209:181b-33: yid bzhin nor bu rang gi srog bzhin blang //
T02D2209:181b-34: srung dang blang sogs bca' thabs mkhas pas bya //
T02D2209:181b-35: des ni rtag tu bde ldan sdug bsngal spang //
T02D2209:181b-36: bdag gis thabs 'di brtsams par mi rigs kyang //
T02D2209:181b-37: bslab pa gnas phyir nor bu len byed brtsams //
T02D2209:181b-38: 'di las bdag gis bsod nams ci thob pa //
T02D2209:181b-39: des ni thams cad bde bar gnas par shog /
T02D2209:181b-40: dam tshig gi rgyan rdzogs so /
T02D2209:181b-43: bsnyen gnas sdom pa nya stong dam tshes brgyad gang rung la blang ngo //
T02D2209:181b-45: dbye na sna 'ga' srung ba'i dge bsnyen rtsa ba lnga nas 'ga' srung pa'o //
T02D2209:181b-46: tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen ni /
T02D2209:182a-1: rang gi bud med min pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2209:182a-2: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la lugs gnyis te /
T02D2209:182a-3: rtsa ba lnga ka srung ba'o //
T02D2209:182a-4: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la /
T02D2209:182a-5: dge tshul gyi sdom pa nas phyi dro'i kha zas kyi bar du bya ba nas /
T02D2209:182a-6: khyim pa'i rtags spang ba de gnyis min pa bcu'o ;
T02D2209:182a-7: / dge tshul gyi sdom pa la bcu gsum mo //
T02D2209:182a-8: dge slong la khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D2209:182a-9: byang chub sems kyi sdom pa la nyi shu tham pa /
T02D2209:182a-10: sngags kyi dam tshig la rang gi dam tshig dang sngags pa'i gnyis so //
